Events"}},"dataSources":{"ds_rwUdpTZp":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup asm_risk_instances_lookup | where strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") >=if(replace("$risk_time.earliest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),"$risk_time.earliest$"),"$risk_time.earliest$") AND strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") <if(replace("$risk_time.latest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),if("$risk_time.latest$"="now", "-0","$risk_time.latest$")),"$risk_time.latest$") | search type=host
| stats count by status","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$risk_time.earliest$","latest":"$risk_time.latest$"}},"name":"Host Risks"},"ds_7TL51sUB":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup asm_risk_instances_lookup | where strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") >=if(replace("$risk_time.earliest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),"$risk_time.earliest$"),"$risk_time.earliest$") AND strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") <if(replace("$risk_time.latest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),if("$risk_time.latest$"="now", "-0","$risk_time.latest$")),"$risk_time.latest$")
| search type=webentity
| stats count by status","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$risk_time.earliest$","latest":"$risk_time.latest$"}},"name":"Web Entity Risks"},"ds_1QGxZGCZ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"|inputlookup asm_risk_instances_lookup 
|where strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") >=if(replace("$risk_time.earliest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),"$risk_time.earliest$"),"$risk_time.earliest$") AND strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") <if(replace("$risk_time.latest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),if("$risk_time.latest$"="now", "-0","$risk_time.latest$")),"$risk_time.latest$")
|search type=domain
|stats count by status","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$risk_time.earliest$","latest":"$risk_time.latest$"}},"name":"Domain Risks"},"ds_nfzc9aiN":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup asm_risk_instances_lookup |where strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") >=if(replace("$risk_time.earliest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),"$risk_time.earliest$"),"$risk_time.earliest$") AND strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") <if(replace("$risk_time.latest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),if("$risk_time.latest$"="now", "-0","$risk_time.latest$")),"$risk_time.latest$") 
| search type=bucket
| stats count by status","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$risk_time.earliest$","latest":"$risk_time.latest$"}},"name":"Bucket Risks"},"ds_uijxivM1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup asm_risk_instances_lookup |where strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") >=if(replace("$risk_time.earliest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),"$risk_time.earliest$"),"$risk_time.earliest$") AND strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") <if(replace("$risk_time.latest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),if("$risk_time.latest$"="now", "-0","$risk_time.latest$")),"$risk_time.latest$")
|search (port=22 OR port=21 OR port=23 OR port=25 OR port=53 OR port=80 OR port=110 OR port=143 OR port=443 OR port=3389) | stats count by status","enableSmartSources":true,"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$risk_time.earliest$","latest":"$risk_time.latest$"}},"name":"Risky Ports"},"ds_UQ5a0kbQ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=HOST_VULNERABILITY | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true,"queryParameters":{}},"name":"vuln"},"ds_AlaqYrrn":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=HOST | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"host"},"ds_VM56VzWq":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=HOST_PORT | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"host_port"},"ds_k9wVygRd":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=HOST_PROTOCOL | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"host_protocol"},"ds_XcWj392e":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=CERT | stats count by operation"},"name":"cert"},"ds_Njr277hT":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=HOST_SOFTWARE | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"software"},"ds_AdnwlYj4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=OBJECT_STORAGE | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"Storage Bucket"},"ds_Gwb5Lzna":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=DOMAIN | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"domain"},"ds_gI9aQRxx":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=DOMAIN_SUBDOMAIN | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"subdomain"},"ds_v3dK6uRJ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=DOMAIN_EXPIRATION_DATE | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"expired_domain"},"ds_2mehYjDM":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=DOMAIN_REGISTRAR | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"domain_registrar"},"ds_URxM5S6o":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=DOMAIN_MAIL_EXCHANGE_SERVER | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"mail_exchange_server"},"ds_44vExJ8X":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" type=DOMAIN_NAME_SERVER | stats count by operation","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"DOMAIN_NAME_SERVER"},"ds_7TR6IGyB":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype="censys:asm:logbook" 
| search type=$selected_type$ operation=$event_operation$ 
| spath _raw
| table type, operation, entity.*, data.*","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"logbook2"},"ds_HqSDxQCH":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup asm_risk_instances_lookup |where strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") >=if(replace("$risk_time.earliest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),"$risk_time.earliest$"),"$risk_time.earliest$") AND strptime(updatedAt, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") <if(replace("$risk_time.latest$","\d","")!="",relative_time(now(),if("$risk_time.latest$"="now", "-0","$risk_time.latest$")),"$risk_time.latest$")
| search (type=$asset_type$ status=$risk_status$ )
| lookup asm_risk_types_lookup id as typeID OUTPUT remediations | table displayName, ip, name, severity, status, type, port, remediations","enableSmartSources":true,"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$risk_time.earliest$","latest":"$risk_time.latest$"}},"name":"riskEvens"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}},"tokens":{"default":{"event_operation":{"value":"*"},"selected_type":{"value":"*"},"asset_type":{"value":"host"},"risk_status":{"value":"open"},"status":{"value":"open"}}}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-30d@d,now"},"title":"Logbook Time Range"},"input_2":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"risk_time","defaultValue":"-30d@d,now"},"title":"Risk Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"grid","options":{"submitButton":false,"height":550,"gutterSize":9},"structure":[{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":200,"h":172}},{"item":"viz_chart_7","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":172,"w":200,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_chart_13","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":352,"w":200,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":552,"w":600,"h":372}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":200,"y":0,"w":200,"h":172}},{"item":"viz_chart_8","type":"block","position":{"x":200,"y":172,"w":200,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_chart_14","type":"block","position":{"x":200,"y":352,"w":200,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_chart_3","type":"block","position":{"x":400,"y":0,"w":200,"h":172}},{"item":"viz_chart_9","type":"block","position":{"x":400,"y":172,"w":200,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_chart_15","type":"block","position":{"x":400,"y":352,"w":200,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_chart_4","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":0,"w":200,"h":172}},{"item":"viz_chart_10","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":172,"w":200,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_chart_16","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":352,"w":200,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_table_2","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":552,"w":600,"h":372}},{"item":"viz_chart_5","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":0,"w":200,"h":172}},{"item":"viz_chart_11","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":172,"w":200,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_chart_17","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":352,"w":200,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_chart_6","type":"block","position":{"x":1000,"y":0,"w":200,"h":172}},{"item":"viz_chart_12","type":"block","position":{"x":1000,"y":172,"w":200,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_chart_18","type":"block","position":{"x":1000,"y":352,"w":200,"h":200}}],"globalInputs":["input_1","input_2"]},"description":"","title":"Censys
